name: Dual Destinies
description:
STORY

A legend was once told that two penguins will appear on the Easter Islands. They're called Flip and Flop and they're here to gather all the gold they can.

Control Flip and Flop in their frantic puzzle quest to gather all the gold. Swap places with your shadow twin to complete the puzzles and become rich.

HOW TO PLAY

The game is playable here in your web browser, or on your Windows desktop PC in TWO (yes, TWO) flavours - you can play the Global Game Jam entry (the original, without cute penguins and little Quality of Life touches) or the version you see here. There's also a modern build available of the post-jam version, that might be more compatible with modern PCs, but lacks the true retro feel.

Use arrow keys to move the penguins, Space to swap places, R to restart the level, F4 to set fullscreen and ESC to quit.

For the exit to open, you need to collect all the gold. Just don't get killed by skulls or the water!

CREDITS

A game by KitsuneFox / Extremely Awesome Games. Made for the Global Game Jam 2022 / PolyJam 2022, theme: DUALITY. Fonts by Pjik and Gasara on DeviantArt. Inspired by the NES game Binary Land.
